solutionnet.title: SolutionNet Plus
solutionnet.subtitle: Internet & Telephony Solutions
solutionnet.description: A comprehensive web application for SolutionNet Plus, a Quebec-based HVAC service company. Features online appointment booking, automated scheduling, and multilingual support.

quebecar.title: QuebeCar
quebecar.subtitle: Car Sales Platform
quebecar.description: An innovative bilingual car sales platform built with Laravel and React, featuring secure payments, media management, and comprehensive vehicle listings.

edunova.title: Edunova LMS
edunova.subtitle: Learning Management System
edunova.description: A modern education platform with microservices architecture, supporting video streaming, course management, and real-time progress tracking.
